name: Global Musical Tweets
tagline: Geo-spatial clustering of micro-blogged music listening behavior
body:
## Introduction
This is the project page for a General Assembly Data Science final project involving the exploration of musical listening behavior as derived from Twitter social sharing activity.

## Background
The motivation for this work stems from a desire to better understand the landscape of music and listening behavior from a spatial perspective.

### Data
The primary source of data for this work is the [Million Musical Tweets Dataset](http://www.cp.jku.at/datasets/MMTD/), which comprises over a million samples of tweets.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
